title: Compulsory Gymnastic Routines for Women Level Class V
brief_description: Takes a new look at basic skills in light of the changed requirements. An ideal introductory course for leaders of P.E. classes, recreational programs and beginning gymnastic instruction. Beginners see graphically how to execute all the right fundamental moves in the four basic events, with the accent on safety - creating a lifelong basis for safe performance.
